CURRICULUM VITAE
Richard James Maguire
Attwood Barn, Hobro, Wolverley, Worcestershire. DY11 5SZ
01562 914681 / 07738438424
richmaguire@me.com
PROFILE
I am an Inspired, well presented Sales Engineer involved and conversant in all aspects of the Plastic Injection Moulding Industry, Rapid Prototyping and Low Volume Production solutions in Plastic and Metal. Having been integral part of the Manufacturing and Sales process, I pride myself on doing the undoable, thinking outside the box and have built a formidable reputation for excellent service, can do attitude with an understanding and interpretation of what the client wants.... did I mention, never missing an opportunity.

Richard James Maguire
Attwood Barn, Hobro, Wolverley, Worcestershire. DY11 5SZ
01562 914681 / 07738438424
richmaguire@me.com
PROFILE
I am an Inspired, well presented Sales Engineer involved and conversant in all aspects of the Plastic Injection Moulding Industry, Rapid Prototyping and Low Volume Production solutions in Plastic and Metal. Having been integral part of the Manufacturing and Sales process, I pride myself on doing the undoable, thinking outside the box and have built a formidable reputation for excellent service, can do attitude with an understanding and interpretation of what the client wants.... did I mention, never missing an opportunity.
MAJOR ACHIEVEMENTS
In 2010 while at Moldwel Products, without any sales experience, in the grips of recession achieving almost £1million worth of new business in a 12-month period which comprised of 20 new customers with and without existing tooling.
2011 - 2014, with a hands-on attitude creating Stephens Plastic Moulding Ltd. from scratch utilising my extensive Technical experience to purchase, install and commission machinery and robots coupled with my flair for sales to build a strong Client base including customers from the automotive, food, manufacturing and medical sectors.
After a year of working at Schneider Prototyping being promoted to Lead Sales Manager after growing Sales, expanding the customer base and over achieving Sales Targets.
Exceeding 1st year sales target of £800k by 15% in 2016.
Doubling Sales at Hydrovern within 12 months entirely from New Clients.
CAREER HISTORY
Axiom Product Development.
February 20 – Present. – Sales Engineer – Home Based
Joining Axiom just before a global pandemic hit was probably not one of my finer ideas but none the less I have added £500000 in new sales from a wide business sector.
Hydrovern Ltd.
April 17 – February 20 - Sales Engineer (Sales and Projects) – Home Based.
I re-joined Hydrovern as Sales Engineer after a 12-year separation. My objective here has been to build clients and Sales in Injection Moulding and Rapid Prototyping for the Automotive, Design, medical and trade industries following a period of 10 years of company stagnation and decline.
I have sourced and secured business with Leading UK Vehicle Manufactures, Powertrain, design houses, Medtec and general industry producing Prototypes with the objective of taking these parts into production in the UK and offshore with our partners in China and India.
The services I built and provide at Hydrovern – SLS / SLA / FDM, Vacuum Casting, Prototype and production Injection Moulding, CNC machining in Plastic and Metal, Fabrication, Metal Casting, Assembly, General Engineering, consultancy and added value services along with CMM, PPAP, IMDS etc.
Schneider Prototyping UK Ltd.
August 14 – August 15 - Business Development Manager – Home Based.
August 15 – April 17 - Lead Sales Manager – Home Based.
I joined Schneider Prototyping in August 2014 and was charged with bringing Sales growth from the UK focussing on Automotive and diversifying into Medtec.
The company was German owned and required travel throughout the UK and Germany.
Sales Reporting directly to CEO with monthly sales reports, presentations and forecasts
Responsible for the Business Development Managers and Project Management team.
Identifying and targeting key customers and make initial contact, company presentations though to Managing and building quotation requests
Increasing Sales and Customer base, UK Wide.
Home office based
Organising UK Sales tours with the Global Group Sales Manager.
Stephens Plastic Mouldings Ltd.
February 2011 – July 2014 - Engineering Director
Initially responsible for the setting up ‘the backbone’ of an Injection Moulding Facility utilising 12 Battenfeld Injection moulding machines ranging from 25t – 350t  including purchasing, installation and commissioning of all necessary supporting equipment to process engineering and commodity polymers including metal filled materials.
Implementation and completion of ISO9001 /14001 and writing the company Website all of which was completed within 3 months of company establishment.

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
